name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Developer with expertise in **Node.js**, **Express**, **Nest.js**, and **TypeScript**, focused on building scalable and user-friendly applications. Proficient in modern frontend technologies including **Vue**, **Nuxt**, and **Web Components**, adept at utilizing **GraphQL** for efficient data fetching. Demonstrates strong version control skills with **Git** and embraces containerization with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Experienced in implementing microfrontend architectures, applying feature toggles, and ensuring accessibility standards. Committed to delivering high-quality code and driving innovation, with a proven track record in sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, significantly enhancing system performance and user satisfaction.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable web applications using **Node.js** and **Express**, ensuring robust back-end API services and achieving a response time improvement of **50%**.
Engineered features with **Nest.js**, facilitating improved modularization of code and a **40%** reduction in development time for new functionalities.
Implemented front-end solutions with **Vue** and **Nuxt**, enhancing user experience and achieving a **30%** increase in page load speeds through optimized rendering.
Created and maintained GraphQL APIs for efficient data retrieval, improving request efficiency by **60%** and minimizing over-fetching.
Utilized **TypeScript** for enhanced type safety in application development, reducing runtime errors by **25%**.
Designed and integrated microservices using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless deployment in scalable environments with a **99.5%** uptime.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git** and deployment strategies that decreased release cycles by **70%** through automated testing and deployment processes.
Adopted **Feature toggles** for agile feature management and version control, streamlining the release process.
Focused on accessibility standards within web components to enhance usability for all users, achieving compliance with WCAG 2.1 guidelines.

• Leveraged **Node.js**, **Express**, and **Nest.js** to design and implement robust backend services, enhancing system reliability by 30%.
• Developed intuitive user interfaces using **Vue**, **Nuxt**, and **TypeScript**, increasing user engagement metrics by 40%.
• Integrated **GraphQL** for efficient data querying and optimized customer interactions, resulting in faster load times by 15%.
• Utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, achieving 60% reduction in deployment errors.
• Implemented **Git** for version control and team collaboration, improving code review processes by 50%.
• Enhanced accessibility features in applications to meet compliance standards, positively impacting user satisfaction scores by 25%.

Developed scalable applications using **Node.js**, **Express**, and **Nest.js** integrating with **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval, leading to a 25% increase in response time.
Implemented modern frontend solutions with **Vue** and **Nuxt**, enhancing user experience and achieving a 30% decrease in bounce rate.
Utilized **TypeScript** for type safety and improved maintainability, resulting in 20% fewer runtime errors.
Managed version control and collaboration through **Git**, ensuring a streamlined workflow across teams.
Deployed containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestrated with **Kubernetes**, allowing for seamless scaling and a **99.5%** uptime.
Implemented **microfrontends** architecture to break down monolithic structures, leading to a **15%** increase in deployment speed.
Ensured accessibility standards across all platforms, enhancing user engagement and meeting compliance with WCAG 2.1.

skills:
****Programming Languages****
	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

****Backend Frameworks****
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

****Frontend Frameworks****
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, Web Components, Nuxt

****API Technologies****
	RESTful API design, GraphQL

****Serverless and Cloud Functions****
	AWS Lambda, API Gateway

****Databases****
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

****DevOps****
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

****Cloud & Infrastructure****
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), CloudWatch, ELK Stack, Git

****Other****
	Microservices, Microfrontends, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, accessibility, Feature toggles
